org.bremersee.dccon.repository

Interface DnsNodeRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DnsNodeRepositoryImpl, DnsNodeRepositoryMock

    @Validated
public interface DnsNodeRepository
    The dns node repository.
    Author:
    Christian Bremer
